positive_examples: This is an example of propaganda operation.
The propaganda operation demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed propaganda operation in this context.
A typical case of propaganda operation would involve these features.
The concept of propaganda operation applies here.
A systematic effort to influence public opinion or behavior through biased or misleading information dissemination.
negative_examples: This is an example of c t intelligence operation, not propaganda operation.
This represents offensive information operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CTIntelligenceOperation, or other types of OffensiveInformationOperation

definition: A coordinated effort to spread biased information to influence attitudes.
